answers.answer: Yes I know that afrezza is not fda approved but if it was would you and other diabetics use it.
Most likely.  If it was studied to be safe and shown to be effective.

question: I am curious has anybody with diabetes 1 or 2 know anything about a company called mannkind. Mannkind is in the approval process for a inhaled insulin called afrezza which is taken with a inhaler.
title: would you try a inhaled insulin.
